name: JavaScript, Typescript
description: Essential programming languages for web development and creating interactive applications.

name: Css, Scss
description: Style technologies for designing and formatting web pages, enabling adaptive and dynamic designs.

name: Html
description: Standard markup language used to create and structure web pages.

description: Web design approach that aims to create sites offering an optimal viewing experience on a wide range of devices.
